title.rendered: Delhi vs Mumbai, Indian First-Class Trophy 2022: Today’s Match Preview, Fantasy Cricket Tips

content.rendered:
We have opted for a fantasy cricket team based on the recent performances, overall impact, and credit points.

Probable XIs

Delhi: Dhruv Shorey, Ayush Badoni, Vaibhav Rawal, Yash Dhull (c), Himmat Singh, Divij Mehra, Anuj Rawat/Lakshay Thareja (wk), Hrithik Shokeen, Pranshu Vijayran, Harshit Rana, Yogesh Sharma

Mumbai: Prithvi Shaw, Ajinkya Rahane (c), Mohit Avasthi, Prasad Pawar (wk), Sarfaraz Khan, Royston Dias, Armaan Jaffer, Tushar Deshpande, Musheer Khan/Yashaswi Jaiswal, Shams Mulani, Tanush Kotian

Pitch Report

Venue: Arun Jaitley Stadium, Delhi

(Based on the last 3 games)

1st innings average score: 296

2nd innings average score: 345

3rd innings average score: 246

4th innings average score: 147

Wickets per innings: 8

Type: Balanced

Wins

Batting 1st: —

Batting 2nd: 33%

Fantasy Tips of The Day

At Delhi, Ajinkya Rahane has 3 hundreds in 4 games – two of which were twin hundreds against South Africa in 2015.

Dhruv Shorey has excellent numbers at his home ground. In 12 matches, he has accumulated 875 runs at 58, including three hundreds and four fifties. His highest score (185) of the season came at the very venue.

Hrithik Shokeen has featured in the Ultimate Team in two of the last 3 games. He has taken consecutive four-fors and scored consecutive fifties.

Shams Mulani’s Ultimate Team percentage this season reads 80. With 35 wickets in 5 games, he is the second-highest wicket-taker.

In the last three games at the venue, all 3 five-fors and 2 of 4 four-fors belonged to pacers. Spinners could not take the centre stage.

While Mumbai seem balanced in all departments, Delhi have been heavily relying on Dhruv Shorey. In addition, for such conditions, Mumbai’s pacers have more menacing numbers.
